subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: John Madden scored two goals and Martin Brodeur made 29 saves, including a game-turning stop of a penalty shot, to lead the Devils to victory over the Philadelphia Flyers on Sunday in Newark.
snippet: John Madden scored two goals and Martin Brodeur made 29 saves, including a game-turning stop of a penalty shot, to lead the Devils to victory over the Philadelphia Flyers on Sunday in Newark.
